title: Bug 40844JDBCRealm.getPassword throws NullPointerException
description: Bug 40844JDBCRealm.getPassword throws NullPointerException JDBCRealm.getPassword throws NullPointerExceptionI'm using tomcat 5.5.20 with postgresql8.1407.jdbc3.jar and postgresql8.1.4on Ubuntu Dapper.
OB: Authenticating two users simultaneously with HTTP DIGESTcauses sometimes the following errors and a 401 Unauthorized reply:30.10.2006 14:24:54 org.apache.catalina.realm.JDBCRealm getPasswordSEVERE: Exception performing authenticationorg.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: invalid message
